½ cup water,¼ cup chicken broth,1 teaspoon minced garlic,½ cup pearl (Israeli) couscous,1 cup canned chickpeas (garbanzo beans), rinsed and drained,¼ cup chopped sun-dried tomatoes,¼ cup sliced Kalamata olives,2 tablespoons crumbled feta cheese,1 tablespoon white wine vinegar,1 ½ teaspoons lemon juice,1 teaspoon dried oregano,½ teaspoon ground black pepper,,
